name: liwu/MNBVC
description: The MNBVC dataset, a comprehensive Chinese corpus, is a groundbreaking resource for language modeling and text generation tasks. Created by liwu, this dataset, known as the Massive Never-ending BT Vast Chinese corpus, is a vast, never-ending collection of text data. It is particularly useful for masked language modeling and fill-mask tasks, making it an invaluable tool for researchers and developers in the field. The dataset is available on Hugging Face's dataset repository under the MIT license.
citeAs: @misc{mnbvc,   author = {{MOP-LIWU Community} and {MNBVC Team}},   title = {MNBVC: Massive Never-ending BT Vast Chinese corpus},   year = {2023},   publisher = {GitHub},   journal = {GitHub repository},   howpublished = {\url{https://github.com/esbatmop/MNBVC}}, }
creator: Language Intelligence and Word Understanding Research Group (LIWU)
